articles.title: Palantir expands AI platform with new government win
articles.summary: The company secured a multi-year defense analytics contract, highlighting momentum in classified AI deployments.

articles.title: Analysts debate sustainability of Palantir's valuation
articles.summary: Equity analysts caution that the stock already prices in aggressive growth assumptions, though backlog continues to build.

articles.title: Commercial segment drives Palantir's latest quarterly beat
articles.summary: Commercial revenue grew 32% year over year as customers expand AI pilots to production workloads.
